column4: Hi.  I want to install Virtualbox(I am running 10.10 x64).  Is the PPA route the best way to install it?  I found this page but it is for lucid.  Any hints or suggestions?  Thanks.  http://www.unixmen.com/news-today/1002-virtualbox-32-is-released
do you have ubuntu tweak installed?
go into the source center in it, and enable the virtual box repository
the virtual box official source i think
is it OSE?  i prefer the non-free
ya lost me.. i see the virtualbox in the sources list as you said... are you saying this is OSE and NOT non-free?
if you install kde apps (like k9copy, k3b,soundkonverter) it has to download the KDE libs...do those libs stay loaded even after you exit the programs? loaded in memory i mean
one is ose, the other is not
yeah i assumed as much too
